patterns

Class AuditPolicyRequirement.AuditPol

  • java.lang.Object
    • patterns.AuditPolicyRequirement.AuditPol
  • Enclosing class:
    AuditPolicyRequirement

    static class AuditPolicyRequirement.AuditPol
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a driver to auditpol.exe; its members correspond to the command line use of auditpol.exe.
